chapter.text: Ngon Nama Allah lon peuphon surat Tuhan Hadharat nyang Maha Murah Tuhanku sidroe geumaseh that-that Donya akhirat rahmat Neulimpah
Sigala pujoe bandum lat batat Bandum nyan meuhat milek Potallah Nyang peujeut alam timu ngon barat Bandum lat batat peuneujeuet Allah
Tuhanku sidroe geumaseh that-that Donya akhirat rahmat Neulimpah
Droeneuh nyan raja uroe akhirat Amai dum meuhat sinan Neubalah
Keu Droeneuh hai Po kamoe ibadat Tulong meularat Droeneuh nyang peuglah
Neutunyok kamoe wahe Hadharat Bak jalan teupat beu roh meulangkah
Bak jalan ureueng nyang Neubri nikmat Jalan seulamat bek jalan salah Bek roh bak jalan ureueng nyang sisat Ureueng nyang batat muruka Allah
